keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Urus S.U.V., unveiled as a concept at the Beijing Auto Show in 2012, also broadens Lamborghini’s portfolio beyond two sleek two-seat super sports cars.

headline.print_headline: Lamborghini Confirms It Will Introduce S.U.V.
headline.main: Lamborghini Confirms It Will Introduce S.U.V.

snippet: The Urus S.U.V., unveiled as a concept at the Beijing Auto Show in 2012, also broadens Lamborghini’s portfolio beyond two sleek two-seat super sports cars.
abstract: Italian sports car maker Lamborghini says it will make luxury sport utility vehicle after receiving 80 million euros ($87 million) in government incentives.
